segments.text: But Ernie , we're still missing something . We need someone to play the music !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh right ... you know , my friend Eric is a DJ . Maybe he would like to play with us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm ... does he have a good ear for hip hop music ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't know , but we can find out . We can talk to him and ask if he wants to join our group .
segments.speaker: S2
